Description: * {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}} Shadow Weave: Ambush Fire Rate reduced from +40% to +30%
* {{PageRef|Wraith}} Wraith: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} Card Trick Spirit scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.2
* Fixed various cases where you could target/select units behind walls with abilities (like {{PageRef|Yamato}} Yamato's {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike)
